Journal.Title: Zhongguo Zhong yao za zhi = Zhongguo zhongyao zazhi = China journal of Chinese materia medica

Article.ArticleTitle: [Review on research progress of chemical constituents and bioactivities of Solidago].

AbstractText: The species of the Solidago are abundant and possess great value in medicine. Many relevant researches of chemical constituents and bioactivities from the genus Solidago have been further reported by many scientists. The review is to present an overview about studies on chemical constituents and bioactivities of the Solidago since 2011, which will provide some foundations and references for the later study.
